item.title: The Road To Learn React
item.description: Hoisting Before the declaration of the function or variables, you can use them. Only declarations are hoisted, without initialize. Initializations using let and const are also not hoisted. // The program can be excuted without any errors. console.log(num); //output undefined num = 7; var num; Scoping let and const are block-scoped in JS, in contrast to var, which is function-scoped. Const vs Let A variable declared with const cannot be re-assigned.
